title: 1922 Norwegian Football Cup
text:
The 1922 <a href="Norwegian%20Football%20Cup">Norwegian Football Cup</a> was the 21st season of the <a href="Norway">Norwegian</a> annual knockout <a href="association%20football">football</a> tournament. The tournament was open for all members of <a href="Football%20Association%20of%20Norway">NFF</a>. <a href="Frigg%20Oslo%20FK">Frigg</a> were the defending champions, but were eliminated by <a href="Moss%20FK">Moss</a> in the fourth round. Last years losing finalist, <a href="Odds%20BK">Odd</a> won their eighth title, having beaten <a href="Kvik%20Halden%20FK">Kvik (Fredrikshald)</a> in the final.
Third round.
Aalesund - Rollon 5-1
Brage - Kvik (Trondhjem) 0-2
Stavanger IF - Brodd 5-1
Donn - Larvik Turn 0-2
Drafn - Storm 1-0
Fram (Larvik) - Sarpsborg 0-2
Fredrikstad - Lillestrøm 8-1
Gjøvik/Lyn - Freidig 5-3
Trygg - Kvik (Fredrikshald) 2-9
Moss - Skotfoss 2-0
Odd - Ready 4-3
Strømsgodset - Ørn 2-3 (extra time)
Kvik (Trondhjem) - Tryggkameratene 7-0
Brann, Frigg, Lyn and Mercantile had a walkover.
Fourth round.
Aalesund - Drafn 0-3
Larvik Turn - Brann 3-1
Kvik (Trondhjem) - Fredrikstad 3-1
Frigg - Moss 0-3
Stavanger IF - Kvik (Fredrikshald) 1-4
Ørn - Gjøvik/Lyn 3-0
Sarpsborg - Lyn 2-1
Mercantile - Odd 1-4
Quarter-finals.
Ørn - Drafn 4-2
Kvik (Trondhjem) - Kvik (Fredrikshald) 3-5
Odd - Larvik Turn 2-1
Sarpsborg - Moss 0-1
Semi-finals.
Moss - Kvik (Fredrikshald) 0-1 
Ørn - Odd 1-2
Final.
October 15: Odd - Kvik (Fredrikshald) 5-1
